data: Respondents were asked if they had ever been told by a doctor or other health professional that they had diabetes. Respondents who had reported having prediabetes, borderline diabetes or gestational diabetes in previous questions were instructed not to include these conditions.

Respondents were asked if they had ever been told by a doctor or other health professional that they had diabetes. Respondents who had reported having prediabetes, borderline diabetes or gestational diabetes in previous questions were instructed not to include these conditions.

Respondents were asked if they had ever been told by a doctor or other health professional that they had diabetes. Respondents who had reported having prediabetes, borderline diabetes or gestational diabetes in previous questions were instructed not to include these conditions.
